svtool.gui
Class DBSessionControlPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  svtool.gui.DBSessionControlPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class DBSessionControlPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

This class is responsible for visually managing the list of all sessions.

See Also:

Field Detail

sessionTab

protected javax.swing.JTabbedPane sessionTab
The tab pane where each tab is for one unique db session name.

cellRenderer

protected javax.swing.ListCellRenderer cellRenderer

sessionList

protected java.util.List sessionList
List of JList objects. Each JList in this list is associated to exactly one item in the JTabbedPane object.

appMediator

protected AppMediator appMediator
The parent object that acts as a mediator. This is only a hack. Ideally ti should be a proper mediator interface that would take care rather than explicit reference to the parent frame.

attachView

public void attachView(Database dbSession,
                       DBView dbView)
Attach a new view to a db session. If the view already exists then it is not listed again. If the db does not exist, a new tab is added for it.

Parameters:
dbSession - The datbase session to which the view is to be attached.
dbView - The view object to attach to the db session.

closeCurrentSession

public void closeCurrentSession()
Close the current session.

detachView

public void detachView(DBView dbView)
Detach a view from the list, effectively closing the view.

Parameters:
dbView - The view object to detach and remove.

getTabTitle
